      public javafx.scene.control.CheckBox enableDragAndDrop(javafx.scene.control.CheckBox checkBox, Card c, int i)
      Enables drag and drop for a subtask
      Parameters:
      checkBox - Checkbox in which subtask is displayed
      c - the card that the subtask is in
      i - position of the subtask in the list of subtasks of the card
      Returns:
      a new checkbox which can be dragged and dropped
